channel.title: Client Help!
channel.description:
Hey!
I got problem with every 317 clients. I don't know what the problem is. I can get on the server it works perfect but when i click on something 2 times the client just shut down. I bought my computer for like 2 months ago. And i have Windows 7. Before i had Windows xp and i had no problems with private servers or clients.
That's all it says when the client shut down:
[URL=http://img121.imageshack.us/i/gfxxl.png/][IMG]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/7647/gfxxl.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Windoes 7 is the WORST windows program to use with Private Servers.
i recommend Windoes Vista, XP, or Linux

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:3, topic:352618”]its the repositories, You might want to run a virtual machine for coding p servers on windows 7

I personally dont like windows at all so i would recommend Linux[/quote]

I agree with that

Read full topic
